<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pierce the Light](/Feats.aspx?ID=2515) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 87 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You tear the veil between the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1) and its shadow. You can cast [_plane shift_](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) twice per week as an occult innate spell that can only target yourself; you can travel only to the Material or [Shadow Planes](/Planes.aspx?ID=11), and your body serves as the focus component.
name: Pierce the Light
